summary: Resource for modders that edits vampire eye asset to allow it to be used on any human, designed to be used for NPC editing/creation.
descriptionHtml:
Small edit to human vampire eye asset to allow it to be used on any human, designed to be used for NPC editing/creation when selecting actual vampire race is not possible/practical. 

Made while I was editing another users mod for my own tastes and they requested I upload this. This seems to work best when its the last in my load list, however some trial and error is required, some npcs seem to dislike been edited, and remember after okaying your changes click the actor in the object window and press CTRL+F4 to export your facial changes THEN Save.

Final version, same changes to other races eye may be a future extra files.
Free to use for All!
author: Tatsu_Ishida
